attributes.action: Change the working day to only 4 seconds long
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that my time spent at work is time wasted, when I could be doing something much more fun, like playing star wars lego on PS2 or reading a nice book.  If everyone (including the eldery and infants) were made to work for 4s every day then surely we could make up the time.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
